authority.serves_description: Processes most New York City parking tickets, camera violations, and parking summonses issued by traffic agents, NYPD officers, and other city agencies.

visual_markers: City of New York Parking Violation
citation_pattern.notes: Violation or notice numbers are 10 digits and appear beside the barcode on the ticket; camera Notice of Liability (NOL) numbers appear in the top right【717975468056129†L181-L188】.

phone_confirmation.purpose: Confirm the Hearings By Mail Unit address for the specific ticket.
